title: If the Jinx changes do go through, please don't change Jinx around this new effect.
body:
I'm not gonna say anything about how much these changes will buff Jinx. But I just want one thing clear. I don't want Jinx to be re balanced around having this new effect. I don't want to see other parts of her kit getting hit to accommodate the new effect. 

If it does end up being too strong, hit the effect. Not her q. Not her passive. Not her r. Hit the w. I'd even be ok if the scaling on the ability had to be lowered. But please, whatever you do, don't change her style of champion

replies.body: I think that will be unlikely cos that would be closer to a rework. I'll be surprised if the buffs even make it to live, the dmg seems a little outrageous to me

I don't really think it is likely either. But you never know. 

If anything, I could see the changes being added but the crit scaling lowered.

They said they like the crit interaction, but damage is way too high. 
>Jinx - we're exploring the concept of spell that can crit, but telegraphs that behavior heavily, with Jinx's W. Concept shows some promise, current numbers are certainly wrong though. Unlikely we'll ship any form of that change in 7.7, though it'll probably remain for a bit longer at least to get further testing. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/yOe5FROl-quick-gameplay-thoughts-march-23
Ah ok. That's probably what they'll do then
Don't worry, riot agrees with you. They just wanted to see if it would work and they think they like the change so far but they agree that they need to change the scaling

Honestly, how often does her W even hit? I know I'm silver but this ability is frequently missed/minion blocked. I don't think this buff is going to force them to change any other part of her kit or drastically change her play style either
From my experience, it is a very easy to dodge ability. However, it can still hit people who are cced. A common thing i see and do in lane is w opponents who step on my traps.
From what I've seen on PBE it doesn't matter who her W hits because it does 1.5k damage even when behind
they reverted the changes on the pbe

Same thing with Quinn, buff her ult back to what it used to be. Nerf the Q/E.
Same thing with Shen, buff his Q back up. @Riot, you said you wanted to make him less impactful on the map, then why are you nerfing his Q instead of his global ult?
Same thing with Soraka, she's fine before, revert the W changes but keep the Q nerf.
Same exact shit with guinsoos, let it come back but less stats per aa.

Riot everytime you nerf something, you nerf it to the place that it's amost not viable, how about you actually ban the things THAT ACTUALLY WAS OP!
No, don't change the style of champion jinx rito!  If you did that, then scripters would have to look for a new champion to afk play. XD
if they make it so the crit only adds 25% bonus damage up to 50% bonus with an ie when it crits then it shouldn't be to bad
Look up vandiril. He made a montage of 1.5k damage crit on a 4 second (the w) cooldown..  I hope this change is just an april fool

riot be like
"We hittin jinxes base attack speed and removing ult execute to allow for jinxes w and grendes to crit."
